{"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (90,0), size = (500,40), flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # index 1 is the language name, MultiContentEntryPixmap(pos = (0,0), size = (60,40), png = 2), # index 2 is the pixmap ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular",28)], "itemHeight": 40 }

screen.name: MessageBoxGenuine
screen.title: Message
screen.applet:
# this should be factored out into some helper code, but currently demonstrates applets. from enigma import eSize, ePoint
orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize()
# y size still must be fixed in font stuff... textsize = (textsize[0] + 50, textsize[1] + 50) offset = 0 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: offset = 60 wsizex = textsize[0] + 60 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset if (280 > wsizex): wsizex = 280 wsize = (wsizex, wsizey)
# resize self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize))
# resize label self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize))
# move list listsize = (wsizex, 50) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(0, textsize[1])) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize))
# center window newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2, orgpos.y()))

screen.name: oscInfo
screen.title: Client Info
screen.applet: from enigma import eSize,ePoint, getDesktop deskwidth = getDesktop(0).size().width() deskheight = getDesktop(0).size().height() # resize self.instance.resize(eSize(*(deskwidth,deskheight))) # center self.instance.move(ePoint(0,0))

widget.convert: {"templates": {"default": (100,[ MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (10,12),size = (100,75),png = 4),# index 4 is the thumbnail MultiContentEntryText(pos = (120,10),size = (510,25),font=0,flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP,text = 1),# index 1 is the Title MultiContentEntryText(pos = (120,40),size = (300,20),font=1,flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP,text = 5),# index 5 is the Published Date MultiContentEntryText(pos = (120,70),size = (300,20),font=1,flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP,text = 6),# index 6 is the Views Count MultiContentEntryText(pos = (420,40),size = (200,20),font=1,flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP,text = 7),# index 7 is the duration MultiContentEntryText(pos = (420,70),size = (200,20),font=1,flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP,text = 8),# index 8 is the ratingcount ]), "status": (100,[ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (10,10),size = (600,28),font=2,flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP,text = 0),# index 0 is the name MultiContentEntryText(pos = (10,40),size = (600,50),font=3,flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP| RT_WRAP,text = 1),# index 2 is the description ]) }, "fonts": [gFont("Regular",20),gFont("Regular",16),gFont("Regular",22),gFont("Regular",18)], "itemHeight": 100 }

screen.name: searchWikipedia
screen.title: Wikipedia - Search for Movie, Director or Actor

widget.convert: {"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (60, 0), size = (30, 30), font = 2, flags = RT_HALIGN_CENTER | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 1), MultiContentEntryText(pos = (100, 0), size = (260, 30), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP, text = 2, color = 0x00ffffff, color_sel = 0x00ffffff), MultiContentEntryText(pos = (390, 15), size = (400, 30), font = 2, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 3, color = 0x0080b5ff, color_sel = 0x00181a1c), MultiContentEntryText(pos = (60, 30), size = (280, 30), font = 3, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 5, color = 0x00bbbbbb, color_sel = 0x00cccccc), MultiContentEntryText(pos = (270, 15), size = (120, 30), font = 3, flags = RT_HALIGN_CENTER, text = 4, color = 0x00bbbbbb, color_sel = 0x00cccccc), MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaBlend(pos=(0, 10), size=(50, 30), png=6, flags = BT_SCALE) ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 20), gFont("Regular", 18), gFont("Regular", 16), gFont("Regular", 16)], "itemHeight": 60 }

{"template": [ MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (15, 6), size = (48, 38), png = 0), # index 0 is the PC pixmap (for pixmap it is png= ) MultiContentEntryText(pos = (90, 0), size = (120, 30), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # index 1 is the Name (for text it is text= ) MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (220, 2), size = (40, 40), png = 2), # index 2 is the system pixmap MultiContentEntryText(pos = (290, 0), size = (250, 30), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 3), # index 3 is the IP MultiContentEntryText(pos = (290, 30), size = (250, 30), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 4), # index 4 is the MAC ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 20),gFont("Regular", 16)], "itemHeight": 60 }

{"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos=(0,0), size=(400,50), font=0, flags=RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text=1), # Title MultiContentEntryText(pos=(400,20), size=(140,30), font=0, flags=RT_HALIGN_RIGHT, text=2), # State MultiContentEntryProgress(pos=(550,15), size=(100,30), percent=-3), # Progress MultiContentEntryText(pos=(660,20), size=(130,50), font=0, flags=RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text=4), # Percentage ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular",20)], "itemHeight": 60}
